reviews.review_msg: While some have complained about his personality, I found him to be both a pleasure to work with as well as challenging. He cares deeply about the material and is always willing to talk about interesting matters. He doesn't teach with a textbook, which in psychology is a major point in his favour. The material is difficult;prepare to practice daily

I dreaded taking 301 because I hated 210 (which I took twice) and all other math courses. Mike helped me really understand the concepts that I learned in 210 and apply them. I made sure I registered in 415 with him. He tends to go fast, but will go back and reteach harder material. Go to office hours and ask questions!
